headline: ‘Baseload Power’ Will Be Big in 2026. 5 Stocks Can Win.
summary: The buildout of artificial-intelligence data centers has been a boon for utilities, makers of power-generation equipment, and hosts of industrial companies supplying electrical components.  Investors, however, might need to refine their portfolios a little to keep getting the jolt from artificial intelligence.  “Heading into 2026, we expect baseload power sources to remain top of mind for investors, though we expect the thematic trade to become more nuanced by individual stock fundamentals and valuation, rather than simply by exposure,” wrote J.P. Morgan analyst Mark Strouse on Monday.

headline: Dycom Stock Soars 40% in 3 Months: Buy the Surge Now or Wait?
summary: DY's 40% surge rides on fiber, data-center and BEAD tailwinds. But with premium valuation creeping higher, is this breakout built to last?
